statements: SELECT * FROM playlists;
SELECT playlist_id, playlist_name FROM playlists;
SELECT playlist_name, created_on FROM playlists;
SELECT playlist_id, last_modified FROM playlists;
SELECT * FROM playlists ORDER BY created_on DESC;
SELECT * FROM playlists WHERE playlist_id = 1;
SELECT playlist_id, playlist_name FROM playlists WHERE created_on > '2022-01-01';
SELECT playlist_id, playlist_name, created_on FROM playlists WHERE playlist_name LIKE '%Rock%';
SELECT * FROM playlists ORDER BY last_modified DESC;
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM playlists;
SELECT * FROM playlists;
SELECT name FROM playlists WHERE id = 1;
SELECT id, name FROM playlists ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT * FROM song_rotations WHERE rotation_type = 'special';
SELECT id, rotation_date FROM song_rotations ORDER BY rotation_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM playlists WHERE id = 1;
SELECT name FROM playlists WHERE id = 2;
SELECT id, name FROM playlists WHERE name LIKE 'S%';
SELECT * FROM song_rotations WHERE rotation_type = 'special' ORDER BY rotation_date DESC;
SELECT id, rotation_date, rotation_type FROM song_rotations WHERE rotation_date > '2021-01-01' AND rotation_type = 'regular';
SELECT * FROM radio_station_playlists;
SELECT playlist_name, created_at FROM radio_station_playlists ORDER BY created_at DESC;
SELECT playlist_id, playlist_name FROM radio_station_playlists WHERE playlist_name LIKE 'Summer%';
SELECT feedback_text, feedback_rating FROM listener_feedback WHERE feedback_rating > 3;
SELECT rotation_id, rotation_time, rotation_count FROM song_rotations ORDER BY rotation_time ASC LIMIT 10;
SELECT * FROM radio_station_playlists WHERE playlist_id = 100;
SELECT playlist_name, created_at FROM radio_station_playlists ORDER BY created_at DESC;
SELECT * FROM song_rotations INNER JOIN radio_station_playlists ON song_rotations.rotation_id = radio_station_playlists.playlist_id;
SELECT rotation_count, rotation_time FROM song_rotations WHERE rotation_count > 10 ORDER BY rotation_time ASC;

SELECT playlist_name, playlist_id, COUNT(song_id) AS song_count FROM song_rotations LEFT JOIN radio_station_playlists ON song_rotations.rotation_id = radio_station_playlists.playlist_id GROUP BY playlist_id HAVING COUNT(song_id) > 5;
SELECT * FROM playlists;
SELECT name, description FROM playlists WHERE id = 1;
SELECT title, artist FROM songs WHERE duration > 180;
SELECT * FROM rotations ORDER BY rotation_date DESC;
SELECT listener_name, comment, rating FROM feedback WHERE playlist_id = 2 AND rating >= 4;
SELECT * FROM playlists;
SELECT name, description FROM playlists WHERE id = 1;
SELECT title, artist, duration FROM songs ORDER BY title DESC;
SELECT * FROM rotations WHERE rotation_date >= '2022-01-01' AND rotation_date <= '2022-12-31';
SELECT playlist_id, song_id, listener_name, rating FROM feedback WHERE rating > 3 ORDER BY rating DESC, listener_name;
SELECT * FROM playlists;
SELECT name, description FROM playlists WHERE id = 1;
SELECT title, artist FROM songs ORDER BY artist DESC;
SELECT id, rotation_date, rotation_time FROM rotations WHERE rotation_date = '2023-01-01';
SELECT name, city FROM listeners WHERE city = 'New York'
SELECT * FROM playlists;
SELECT id, name FROM playlists WHERE id = 5;
SELECT title, artist FROM songs WHERE duration > '00:03:00';
SELECT l.name AS listener_name, f.feedback_text FROM listeners l JOIN feedback f ON l.id = f.listener_id;
SELECT s.title, r.rotation_date, r.rotation_time FROM songs s JOIN rotations r ON s.id = r.song_id WHERE r.rotation_date > '2022-01-01';
